synopsis.text: Slowly but surely, a physically feeble yet morally upright teenager, Wang Chao, is guided by Tang Zichen, a revered master of Chinese martial arts, to traverse the winding path of traditional martial arts. As Wang Chao blossoms into a formidable martial artist, he surpasses his own limitations and embraces the spirit of martial artists who use their skills to quell conflicts and inspire others with their virtue. With unwavering dedication, Wang Chao upholds the legacy of traditional martial arts and champions righteousness in a world plagued by injustice.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
